summary: Build a Bootstrap-based HTML login page with email and password fields.

existing_features.title: Create a dedicated login page UI that contains a Bootstrap-styled form with the following fields: Email (type=email) and Password (type=password), plus a primary “Log in” submit button.
Include Bootstrap in the frontend so the login page renders with Bootstrap styles without requiring any manual CSS setup by the user.
Apply a consistent visual theme for the login page (spacing, typography, and layout) that complements Bootstrap, using a warm neutral palette (avoid blue/purple) and a centered card layout.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create an HTML login page using Bootstrap with email and password inputs

projectName: Bootstrap-styled login page with email and password
